Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: I'm good enough, I'm smart enough, and doggone it, people like me.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt!

Quote: I am a worthy human being.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: Trace it, face it, and erase it.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: I don't know what I'm doing. They're gonna cancel the show. I'm gonna die homeless and penniless and twenty pounds overweight and no one will ever love me.

Quote: You're only as sick as your secrets.

Quote: You need a checkup from the neckup.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: I am a human being, not a human doing.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: Pee-wee Herman: There but for the grace of God go I.

Name: Stuart Smalley
Quote: It's easier to put on slippers than to carpet the whole world.
